author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 30-year-old woman was found dead in her house at Radha Nagar in the city on Tuesday. The victim has been identified as Manimeghalai, wife of Bhoominathan. Preliminary investigation has indicated strangulation as the cause of death. Her husband and one- year-old child were found missing.

House burgled

Unidentified persons allegedly burgled the house of A. Ibrahim (32) at Mangalam during the late hours of Monday and decamped with jewellery, motorcycle and Rs.1. 3 lakh cash.
title: Woman found dead
